trans-unit.target: 换而言之，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29>方法确定是否两个<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象表示的时间的单一点。

trans-unit.source: It directly compares neither dates and times nor offsets.
trans-unit.target: 它将直接进行比较的既不日期和时间，也不偏移量。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects represent the same time and have the same offset value, use the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否两个<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象表示的相同的时间和具有相同的偏移量的值，使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates calls to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29> method to test various pairs of <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects for equality.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29>方法来测试各种对<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象是否相等。

trans-unit.source: The object to compare to the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 要与当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象进行比较的对象。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object represents the same time and has the same offset as a specified <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象与指定的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象是否表示同一时间并且是否具有相同的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object and <paramref name="other" /> have the same date and time value and the same <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset" /> value; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果当前的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象与 <paramref name="other" /> 具有相同的日期和时间值以及相同的 <see cref="P:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset" /> 值，则为 <see langword="true" />；否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Because multiple time zones share a single offset, a return value of `true` does not guarantee that the current and the `other` object represent times in the same time zone.
trans-unit.target: 因为多个时区具有单个偏移量，返回值`true`不保证的当前和`other`相同的时区中的对象表示时间。

trans-unit.source: Unlike the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A> method, the overloads of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%2A> method determine only whether two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values represent a single point in time.
trans-unit.target: 与不同<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A>方法时，重载<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Equals%2A>方法确定是否两个则仅<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值表示的时间的单一点。

trans-unit.source: They do not indicate that two values have the same date and time as well as the same offset.
trans-unit.target: 它们并未指明两个值具有相同的日期和时间，以及相同的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the use of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A> method to compare similar <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A>方法来比较类似<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象。

trans-unit.source: A Windows file time, expressed in ticks.
trans-unit.target: 以计时周期表示的 Windows 文件时间。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified Windows file time to an equivalent local time.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的 Windows 文件时间转换为等效的本地时间。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the date and time of <paramref name="fileTime" /> with the offset set to the local time offset.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，表示偏移量被设置为本地时间偏移量的 <paramref name="fileTime" /> 的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: A Windows file time is a 64-bit value that represents the number of 100-nanosecond intervals that have elapsed since 12:00 midnight, January 1, 1601 A.D.
trans-unit.target: Windows 文件时间是 64 位值，表示第午夜 12:00 到公元 1601 年 1 月 1 日以来经过的 100 毫微秒隔数

trans-unit.source: (C.E.) Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: (C.E.)协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: Windows uses a file time to record when an application creates, accesses, or writes to a file.
trans-unit.target: Windows 使用的文件时间应用程序创建、 访问，或将写入文件时进行记录。

trans-unit.source: A Windows file time is directly accessible through the Windows API by calling the `GetFileTime` function, which returns a `FILETIME` structure.
trans-unit.target: Windows 文件时间可直接访问通过 Windows API 通过调用`GetFileTime`函数，返回`FILETIME`结构。

trans-unit.source: The single function parameter is the handle of the file whose file time information is to be retrieved.
trans-unit.target: 单个函数参数是要检索其文件时间信息的文件句柄。

trans-unit.source: The file handle is retrieved by calling the `CreateFile` function.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用检索的文件句柄`CreateFile`函数。

trans-unit.source: The `FILETIME` structure's `dwHighDateTime` member contains the four high-order bytes of the file time, and its `dwLowDateTime` member contains the four low-order bytes.
trans-unit.target: `FILETIME`结构的`dwHighDateTime`成员包含的文件时间的四个高序位字节并将其`dwLowDateTime`成员包含四个低序位字节。

trans-unit.source: The example that follows illustrates how to retrieve Windows file time values and convert them to <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示如何检索 Windows 文件时间值并将它们转换为<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值。

trans-unit.source: Windows file time values can also be created from <xref:System.DateTime> values by calling the <xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> and <xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTimeUtc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> methods, and from <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToFileTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 也可以从创建 Windows 文件时间值<xref:System.DateTime>值通过调用<xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.DateTime.ToFileTimeUtc%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法，并从<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值通过调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToFileTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the Windows API to retrieve the Windows file times for the WordPad executable.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用 Windows API 检索写字板可执行文件的 Windows 文件时间。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filetime" /> is less than zero.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filetime" /> 小于零。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="filetime" /> is greater than <see langword="DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="filetime" /> 大于 <see langword="DateTimeOffset.MaxValue.Ticks" />。

trans-unit.source: A Unix time, expressed as the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z (January 1, 1970, at 12:00 AM UTC).
trans-unit.target: 一个 Unix 时间，它表示为从 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z（1970 年 1 月 1 日，UTC 时间上午 12:00）开始已经过的毫秒数。

trans-unit.source: For Unix times before this date, its value is negative.
trans-unit.target: 对于在此日期之前的 Unix 时间，其值为负数。

trans-unit.source: Converts a Unix time expressed as the number of milliseconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z to a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 将表示为从 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z 开始已经过的毫秒数的 Unix 时间转换为 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A date and time value that represents the same moment in time as the Unix time.
trans-unit.target: 一个日期和时间值，以 Unix 时间表示同一时刻。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property value of the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> instance is <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which represents Coordinated Universal Time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>返回的属性值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>实例是<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>，表示协调世界时。

trans-unit.source: You can convert it to the time in a specific time zone by calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其转换为特定时区中的时间通过调用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="milliseconds" /> is less than -62,135,596,800,000.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="milliseconds" /> 小于 -62,135,596,800,000。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="milliseconds" /> is greater than 253,402,300,799,999.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="milliseconds" /> 大于 253,402,300,799,999。

trans-unit.source: A Unix time, expressed as the number of seconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z (January 1, 1970, at 12:00 AM UTC).
trans-unit.target: 一个 Unix 时间，它表示为从 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z（1970 年 1 月 1 日，UTC 时间上午 12:00）开始已经过的秒数。

trans-unit.source: For Unix times before this date, its value is negative.
trans-unit.target: 对于在此日期之前的 Unix 时间，其值为负数。

trans-unit.source: Converts a Unix time expressed as the number of seconds that have elapsed since 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z to a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 将表示为从 1970-01-01T00:00:00Z 开始已经过的秒数的 Unix 时间转换为 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: A date and time value that represents the same moment in time as the Unix time.
trans-unit.target: 一个日期和时间值，以 Unix 时间表示同一时刻。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property value of the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> instance is <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>, which represents Coordinated Universal Time.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>返回的属性值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>实例是<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>，表示协调世界时。

trans-unit.source: You can convert it to the time in a specific time zone by calling the <xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method.
trans-unit.target: 你可以将其转换为特定时区中的时间通过调用<xref:System.TimeZoneInfo.ConvertTime%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.TimeZoneInfo%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="seconds" /> is less than -62,135,596,800.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="seconds" /> 小于 -62,135,596,800。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="seconds" /> is greater than 253,402,300,799.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="seconds" /> 大于 253,402,300,799。

trans-unit.source: Returns the hash code for the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 返回当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象的哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: A 32-bit signed integer hash code.
trans-unit.target: 32 位有符号整数哈希代码。

trans-unit.source: Gets the hour component of the time represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取由当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象所表示的时间的小时组成部分。

trans-unit.source: The hour component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象的小时组成部分。

trans-unit.source: This property uses a 24-hour clock; the value ranges from 0 to 23.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使用 24 小时制；值介于 0 到 23 之间。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Hour%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Hour%2A>属性的值不影响<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a string representation of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's hour component by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "H", or "HH" custom format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以创建的字符串表示形式<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>通过调用对象的小时部分<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>方法使用"H"或"HH"自定义格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the hour component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object in three different ways:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示的小时部分<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>三个不同的方式的对象：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Hour%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索的值的<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Hour%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "H" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>方法使用"H"格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "HH" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>方法与"HH"格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> value that represents the local date and time of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 值，该值表示当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象的本地日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The local date and time of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象的本地日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: If necessary, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.LocalDateTime%2A> property converts the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's date and time to the local system's date and time.
trans-unit.target: 如有必要，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.LocalDateTime%2A>属性将转换当前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象的日期和时间为本地系统的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The conversion is a two-step operation:
trans-unit.target: 转换是一个包含两个步骤操作：

trans-unit.source: The property converts the current <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's time to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 该属性将当前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象的时间为协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The property then converts UTC to local time.
trans-unit.target: 然后，该属性将 UTC 转换为本地时间。

trans-unit.source: There are no invalid times and ambiguous times are mapped to the local zone's standard time.
trans-unit.target: 没有任何无效的时间，并且不明确的时间映射到本地时区的标准时间。

trans-unit.source: (However, the conversion can create an anomaly: if a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value that is derived from the local computer reflects an ambiguous date and time, that value can be converted to UTC and then back to a local time that differs from the original time.) The property applies any adjustment rules in the local time zone when it performs this conversion.
trans-unit.target: (但是，转换可能出现反常： 如果<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>派生从本地计算机的值反映了不明确的日期和时间，值可以转换为 UTC，然后再为本地时间不同于原始的时间。)执行此转换时，属性适用的本地时区的任何调整规则。

trans-unit.source: This property returns both the date and the time component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object, which makes it useful for <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> to <xref:System.DateTime> conversion.
trans-unit.target: 此属性返回的日期和时间部分<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象，使其非常适合<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>到<xref:System.DateTime>转换。

trans-unit.source: In addition to performing any necessary time conversion, this property differs from the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime%2A> property by setting the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.DateTime> object to <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 除了执行任何必要的时间转换，此属性不同于<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.DateTime%2A>通过设置的值的属性<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A>属性返回<xref:System.DateTime>对象传递给<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates several conversions of <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> values to local times in the U.S. Pacific Standard Time zone.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示的一些转换<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>到美国的本地时间的值太平洋标准时区运行。

trans-unit.source: Note that the last three times are all ambiguous; the property maps all of them to a single date and time in the Pacific Standard Time zone.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，最后三次所有不明确;该属性将所有这些映射到单个日期和时区的太平洋标准时间的时间。

trans-unit.source: Represents the greatest possible value of <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 的最大可能值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 12/31/9999 11:59:59 PM +00:00.

The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue> property is used to determine whether the value of a new <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object or the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value returned by an arithmetic operation is the same as or earlier than this maximum range value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue>属性用于确定是否的新值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>算术运算返回的值是相同等于或早于此最大范围值。

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是这样，该方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value is converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) before the method compares it with <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值转换为协调世界时 (UTC)，该方法将其与进行比较之前<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue>。

trans-unit.source: This means that a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value whose date and time are close to the maximum range, but whose offset is negative, may throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值，其日期和时间是接近最大范围，但其偏移量为负，可能会引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value 12/31/9999 11:00 PM -02:00 is out of range because it is one hour later than <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue> when it is converted to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值 12/31/9999 11:00 PM-02:00 不在范围内，因为它是一小时晚于<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue>时转换为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: Some calendars, such as the <xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>, support an upper date range that is earlier than <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>.
trans-unit.target: 如日历<xref:System.Globalization.UmAlQuraCalendar>，支持早于上部日期范围<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>。

trans-unit.source: In these cases, trying to access <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue> in variable assignments or formatting and parsing operations can throw an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 在这些情况下，尝试访问<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue>变量赋值或格式设置和分析操作中可以引发<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: Instead of retrieving the value of <xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>, you can retrieve the value of the specified culture's latest valid date value from the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 而不是检索的值的<xref:System.DateTime.MaxValue?displayProperty=nameWithType>，你可以检索由指定的区域性的最新的有效日期值的值<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.MaxSupportedDateTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" /> is outside the range of the current or specified culture's default calendar.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.DateTime.MaxValue" /> 位于当前或指定区域性的默认日历的范围之外。

trans-unit.source: Gets the millisecond component of the time represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取由当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象所表示的时间的毫秒组成部分。

trans-unit.source: The millisecond component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, expressed as an integer between 0 and 999.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象的毫秒组成部分，以 0 到 999 之间的一个整数来表示。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a string representation of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's millisecond component by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "fff" custom format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以创建的字符串表示形式<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>通过调用对象的毫秒数部分<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>与"fff"自定义格式说明符的方法。

trans-unit.source: If you rely on properties such as <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A> or <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcNow%2A> to accurately track the number of elapsed milliseconds, the precision of the time's millisecond component depends on the resolution of the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 如果你如依赖于属性<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A>或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.UtcNow%2A>准确地跟踪已用的毫秒数，则时间的毫秒数部分的精度取决于系统时钟的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: On Windows NT 3.5 and later, and Windows Vista operating systems, the clock's resolution is approximately 10-15 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows NT 3.5 和更高版本、 和 Windows Vista 操作系统上，时钟的分辨率为大约 10-15 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the number of milliseconds of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object by using a custom format specifier and by directly accessing the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Millisecond%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示的毫秒数<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象通过使用自定义格式说明符和通过直接访问<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Millisecond%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: Gets the minute component of the time represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取由当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象所表示的时间的分钟组成部分。

trans-unit.source: The minute component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, expressed as an integer between 0 and 59.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象的分钟组成部分，以 0 到 59 之间的一个整数来表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Minute%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Minute%2A>属性的值不影响<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a string representation of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's minute component by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "m", or "mm" custom format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以创建的字符串表示形式<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>通过调用对象的分钟部分<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>方法使用"m"或"mm"自定义格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the minute component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object in three different ways:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示的分钟部分<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>三个不同的方式的对象：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Minute%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索的值的<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Minute%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "m" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>方法使用"m"格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "mm" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>方法带"mm"格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: Represents the earliest possible <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value.
trans-unit.target: 表示可能的最早 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: This field is read-only.
trans-unit.target: 此字段为只读。

trans-unit.source: The value of this constant is 1/1/0001 12:00:00 AM +00:00.

The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue> property is used to determine whether the value of a new <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object or the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value returned by an arithmetic operation is the same as or later than this minimum range value.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>属性用于确定是否的新值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象或<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>算术运算返回的值是相同等于还是晚于此最小范围值。

trans-unit.source: If it is not, the method throws an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果不是这样，该方法将引发<xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>。

trans-unit.source: Any <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value is converted to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) before the method performs the comparison with <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>.
trans-unit.target: 任何<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值转换为协调世界时 (UTC) 之前该方法执行与比较<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>。

trans-unit.source: This means that a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value whose date and time are close to the minimum range, but whose offset is positive, may throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: 这意味着，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值，其日期和时间是接近最小的范围，但其偏移量为正值，则可能引发异常。

trans-unit.source: For example, the value 1/1/0001 1:00:00 AM +02:00 is out of range because it is one hour earlier than <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue> when it is converted to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 例如，值 1/1/0001 1:00:00 AM + 02:00 不在范围内，因为它是一小时早于<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue>时转换为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: Gets the month component of the date represented by the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 获取由当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象所表示的日期的月份组成部分。

trans-unit.source: The month component of the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object, expressed as an integer between 1 and 12.
trans-unit.target: 当前 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象的月份组成部分，以 1 到 12 之间的一个整数来表示。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Month%2A> property is not affected by the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Month%2A>属性的值不影响<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: You can also create a string representation of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object's month component by calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A> method with the "M" or "MM" custom format specifiers.
trans-unit.target: 你还可以创建的字符串表示形式<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>通过调用对象的月份部分<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%2A>方法使用"M"或"MM"自定义格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: The following example displays the month component of a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> value in three different ways:
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例显示的月份部分<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>三个不同的方式的值：

trans-unit.source: By retrieving the value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Month%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 通过检索的值的<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Month%2A>属性。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "M" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>方法使用"M"格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: By calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29> method with the "MM" format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 通过调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToString%28System.String%29>方法带"MM"格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object that is set to the current date and time on the current computer, with the offset set to the local time's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 获取一个 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象，该对象设置为当前计算机上的当前日期和时间，偏移量设置为本地时间与协调世界时 (UTC) 之间的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object whose date and time is the current local time and whose offset is the local time zone's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 一个 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象，其日期和时间为当前的本地时间，其偏移量为本地时区与协调世界时 (UTC) 之间的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The precision of the current local time's millisecond component depends on the resolution of the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 当前的本地时间毫秒组成部分的精度取决于系统时钟的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: On Windows NT 3.5 and later, and Windows Vista operating systems, the clock's resolution is approximately 10-15 milliseconds.
trans-unit.target: 在 Windows NT 3.5 和更高版本、 和 Windows Vista 操作系统上，时钟的分辨率为大约 10-15 毫秒。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A> property to retrieve the current date and time and displays it by using each of the [standard date and time format strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) supported by the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> type.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A>要检索的当前日期和时间属性并将其显示通过使用每个[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)支持<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>类型。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A> and <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Millisecond%2A> properties to determine the resolution of the system clock.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Now%2A>和<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Millisecond%2A>属性来确定系统时钟的分辨率。

trans-unit.source: It displays the time only when the value of its millisecond component has changed.
trans-unit.target: 它显示的时间仅当其毫秒组成部分的值已更改时。

trans-unit.source: Gets the time's offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 获取与协调世界时 (UTC) 之间的时间偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The difference between the current <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object's time value and Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 当前的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象的时间值与协调世界时 (UTC) 之差。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours%2A> property of the returned <xref:System.TimeSpan> object can range from -14 hours to 14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.TimeSpan.Hours%2A>属性返回的<xref:System.TimeSpan>对象介于-14 小时到 14 小时。

trans-unit.source: The value of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property is precise to the minute.
trans-unit.target: 值<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>属性是精确到分钟。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property to display the local time's difference from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>属性，以显示本地时间差异与协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The object to add the time interval to.
trans-unit.target: 要向其加上时间间隔的对象。

trans-unit.source: The time interval to add.
trans-unit.target: 待添加的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Adds a specified time interval to a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object that has a specified date and time, and yields a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object that has new a date and time.
trans-unit.target: 将指定的时间间隔与具有指定的日期和时间的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象相加，产生一个具有新的日期和时间的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象。

trans-unit.source: An object whose value is the sum of the values of <paramref name="dateTimeTz" /> and <paramref name="timeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，其值为 <paramref name="dateTimeTz" /> 与 <paramref name="timeSpan" /> 的值之和。

trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Addition%2A>方法定义的加法运算<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>值。

trans-unit.source: To determine whether two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects represent the same time and have the same offset value, use the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 若要确定是否两个<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象表示的相同的时间和具有相同的偏移量的值，使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.EqualsExact%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: The object to convert.
trans-unit.target: 要转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: Defines an implicit conversion of a <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> object to a <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object.
trans-unit.target: 定义从 <see cref="T:System.DateTime" /> 对象到 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象的隐式转换。

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: 被转换的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Implicit%2A> method enables the compiler to automatically convert a <xref:System.DateTime> object to a <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object without an explicit casting operator (in C#) or a call to a conversion function (in Visual Basic).
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Implicit%2A>方法使编译器能够自动转换<xref:System.DateTime>对象传递给<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>而无需使用显式强制转换运算符 （在 C# 中) 或 （在 Visual Basic) 的转换函数的调用的对象。

trans-unit.source: It defines a widening conversion that does not involve data loss and does not throw an <xref:System.OverflowException>.
trans-unit.target: 它定义一个的扩大转换，不会丢失数据，也不会引发<xref:System.OverflowException>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Implicit%2A> method makes code such as the following possible:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Implicit%2A>方法使以下可以编写诸如代码：

trans-unit.source: This method is equivalent to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: 此方法相当于<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.%23ctor%2A>构造函数。

trans-unit.source: The offset of the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object depends on the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property of the `dateTime` parameter:
trans-unit.target: 所生成的偏移量<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象依赖于的值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性`dateTime`参数：

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the date and time of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is set equal to `dateTime`, and its <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property is set equal to 0.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Utc?displayProperty=nameWithType>，日期和时间<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象设置为等于`dateTime`，并将其<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>属性被设置为 0。

trans-unit.source: If the value of the <xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property is <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>, the date and time of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is set equal to `dateTime`, and its <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A> property is set equal to the offset of the local system's current time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果值<xref:System.DateTime.Kind%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性是<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Local?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.DateTimeKind.Unspecified?displayProperty=nameWithType>，日期和时间<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象设置为等于`dateTime`，并将其<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Offset%2A>属性被设置为本地系统的当前时区的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The equivalent method for this operator is <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>
trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.%23ctor%28System.DateTime%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) date and time that results from applying the offset is earlier than <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 通过应用偏移量得出的协调世界时 (UTC) 日期和时间早于 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue" />。

trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Inequality%2A> method defines the operation of the inequality operator for <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Inequality%2A>方法定义的不相等运算符的运算<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象。

trans-unit.source: It always returns the opposite result from <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Equality%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 它始终返回从相反的结果<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Equality%2A>。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Inequality%2A> method enables code such as the following:
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Inequality%2A>方法使代码如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Before evaluating the `left` and `right` operands for equality, the operator converts both values to Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 在计算之前`left`和`right`相等性，运算符的操作数将这两个值转换为协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: The operation is equivalent to the following:
trans-unit.target: 此操作等效于以下：

trans-unit.source: In other words, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Inequality%2A> method determines whether the two <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects represent different points in time.
trans-unit.target: 换而言之，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Inequality%2A>方法确定是否两个<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象表示的时间的不同点。

trans-unit.source: It directly compares neither dates and times nor offsets.
trans-unit.target: 它将直接进行比较的既不日期和时间，也不偏移量。

trans-unit.source: Languages that do not support custom operators can call the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Compare%2A> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 不支持自定义运算符的语言可以调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Compare%2A>方法相反。

trans-unit.source: In addition, some languages can also call the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Inequality%2A> method directly, as the following example shows.
trans-unit.target: 此外，还可以调用某些语言<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Inequality%2A>方法直接，如以下示例所示。

trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是 <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Compare%28System.DateTimeOffset%2CSystem.DateTimeOffset%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>

trans-unit.source: The first object to compare.
trans-unit.target: 要比较的第一个对象。

trans-unit.target: 要比较的第二个对象。

trans-unit.target: 被减数。

trans-unit.source: The subtrahend.
trans-unit.target: 减数。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts one <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> object from another and yields a time interval.
trans-unit.target: 从一个 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 对象中减去另一个对象并生成时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: An object that represents the difference between <paramref name="left" /> and <paramref name="right" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个表示 <paramref name="left" /> 与 <paramref name="right" /> 之差的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Subtraction%2A> method defines the subtraction operation for <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects.

trans-unit.source: It enables code such as the following:
trans-unit.target: 它使代码如下所示：

trans-unit.target: 不支持自定义的运算符和运算符重载的语言可以调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.DateTimeOffset%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法相反。

trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The date and time object to subtract from.
trans-unit.target: 要从其减去的日期和时间对象。

trans-unit.source: The time interval to subtract.
trans-unit.target: 待减去的时间间隔。

trans-unit.source: Subtracts a specified time interval from a specified date and time, and yields a new date and time.
trans-unit.target: 从指定的日期和时间减去指定的时间间隔，并生成新的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equal to the value of <paramref name="dateTimeOffset" /> minus <paramref name="timeSpan" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它等于 <paramref name="dateTimeOffset" /> 减 <paramref name="timeSpan" /> 的值。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Subtraction%2A> method defines the subtraction operation for <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> objects.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.op_Subtraction%2A>方法定义的减法运算<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象。

trans-unit.source: It enables code such as the following:
trans-unit.target: 它使代码如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Languages that do not support custom operators and operator overloading can call the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method instead.
trans-unit.target: 不支持自定义的运算符和运算符重载的语言可以调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法相反。

trans-unit.target: 此运算符的等效方法是<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Subtract%28System.TimeSpan%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: The resulting <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> value is less than <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue" /> or greater than <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue" />.
trans-unit.target: 所生成的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> 值小于 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MinValue" /> 或大于 <see cref="F:System.DateTimeOffset.MaxValue" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将日期和时间的指定字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的日期和时间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date, time, and offset to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将日期、时间和偏移量的指定字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in <paramref name="input" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它等效于 <paramref name="input" /> 中包含的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%29> parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%29> 分析一个具有三个元素，可以按任意顺序出现，并且用空白分隔字符串。

trans-unit.source: These three elements are as shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 这三个要素是下表中所示。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: \<Date>
trans-unit.target: \<日期 >

trans-unit.source: \<Time>
trans-unit.target: \<Time>

trans-unit.source: \<Offset>
trans-unit.target: \<Offset>

trans-unit.source: Although each of these elements is optional, \<Offset> cannot appear by itself.
trans-unit.target: 尽管每个元素是可选的但\<偏移量 > 不能单独出现。

trans-unit.source: It must be provided together with either \<Date> or \<Time>.
trans-unit.target: 它必须提供一起\<日期 > 或\<时间 >。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is missing, its default value is the current day.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 缺少，其默认值为当前日期。

trans-unit.source: If \<Time> is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<时间 > 缺少，其默认值为 12:00:00 AM。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the current culture's current calendar based on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 是存在但其组件包含仅两个数字的年份，它将转换到基于值的当前区域性的当前日历中每一年<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If \<Offset> is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<偏移量 > 缺少，其默认值为本地时区的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: \<Offset> can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: \<偏移量 > 可以表示负或正偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: In either case, \<Offset> must include a sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下，\<偏移量 > 必须包括正负符号。

trans-unit.source: The `input` string is parsed by using the formatting information in a <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that is initialized for the current culture.
trans-unit.target: `input`通过使用中的格式设置信息分析字符串<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>初始化为当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: To parse a string that contains designated formatting that does not necessarily correspond to the formatting of the current culture, use the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%2A> method and provide a format specifier.
trans-unit.target: 若要分析包含指定的格式设置，不一定对应于当前区域性的格式设置字符串，请使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%2A>方法并提供的格式说明符。

trans-unit.source: The following example calls the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%29> method to parse several date and time strings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%29>方法，以便分析多个日期和时间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: The example includes output from March 22, 2007, on a system whose culture is en-us.
trans-unit.target: 该示例包括从 2007 年 3 月 22 日，输出区域性为 en 的系统上的我们。

trans-unit.source: The offset is greater than 14 hours or less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量大于 14 小时或小于 -14 小时。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 中不包含有效的日期和时间的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> contains the string representation of an offset value without a date or time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包含不带日期或时间的偏移量值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的日期和时间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides culture-specific format information about <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供有关 <c>input</c> 的区域性特定的格式信息。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent using the specified culture-specific format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的区域性特定格式信息，将日期和时间的指定字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in <paramref name="input" />, as specified by <paramref name="formatProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它等效于 <paramref name="input" /> 中包含的日期和时间，由 <paramref name="formatProvider" /> 指定。

trans-unit.source: This method parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space.
trans-unit.target: 此方法分析具有三个元素，可以按任意顺序出现，并且用空白分隔字符串。

trans-unit.source: These three elements are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中显示这些三个元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: \<Date>
trans-unit.target: \<日期 >

trans-unit.source: \<Time>
trans-unit.target: \<Time>

trans-unit.source: \<Offset>
trans-unit.target: \<Offset>

trans-unit.source: Although each of these elements is optional, \<Offset> cannot appear by itself.
trans-unit.target: 尽管每个元素是可选的但\<偏移量 > 不能单独出现。

trans-unit.source: It must be provided together with either \<Date> or \<Time>.
trans-unit.target: 它必须提供一起\<日期 > 或\<时间 >。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is missing, its default value is the current day.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 缺少，其默认值为当前日期。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 是存在但其组件包含仅两个数字的年份，它将转换为一年`provider`参数的当前日历的值基于<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If \<Time> is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<时间 > 缺少，其默认值为 12:00:00 AM。

trans-unit.source: If \<Offset> is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<偏移量 > 缺少，其默认值为本地时区的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: \<Offset> can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: \<偏移量 > 可以表示负或正偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: In either case, \<Offset> must include a sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下，\<偏移量 > 必须包括正负符号。

trans-unit.source: The format of these three elements is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, which can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: 这三个元素的格式由定义`formatProvider`可以为以下对象之一的参数：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in the `input` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示的格式设置中使用的区域性的对象`input`参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting used in `input`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性定义中使用的格式`input`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `formatprovider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用对应于当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The positive or negative sign used in \<Offset> must be either + or -.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的正整数或负号\<偏移量 > 必须为 + 或-。

trans-unit.source: It is not defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A> or <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object of the `formatProvider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它不由定义<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>对象`formatProvider`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following example parses date and time strings that are formatted for the fr-fr culture and displays them using the local system's default en-us culture.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例分析日期和时间字符串的 fr-fr 区域性的格式设置，并显示它们使用本地系统的默认 en-我们区域性。

trans-unit.source: The offset is greater than 14 hours or less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量大于 14 小时或小于 -14 小时。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 中不包含有效的日期和时间的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> contains the string representation of an offset value without a date or time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包含不带日期或时间的偏移量值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的日期和时间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: An object that provides culture-specific format information about <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供有关 <c>input</c> 的区域性特定的格式信息。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the permitted format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的按位组合，指示 <c>input</c> 允许使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: A typical value to specify is <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />.
trans-unit.target: 要指定的一个典型值为 <see cref="F:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None" />。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent using the specified culture-specific format information and formatting style.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的区域性特定格式信息和格式设置样式将日期和时间的指定字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in <paramref name="input" /> as specified by <paramref name="formatProvider" /> and <paramref name="styles" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它等效于 <paramref name="input" /> 中包含的日期和时间，由 <paramref name="formatProvider" /> 和 <paramref name="styles" /> 指定。

trans-unit.source: This method parses a string with three elements that can appear in any order and are delimited by white space.
trans-unit.target: 此方法分析具有三个元素，可以按任意顺序出现，并且用空白分隔字符串。

trans-unit.source: These three elements are shown in the following table.
trans-unit.target: 下表中显示这些三个元素。

trans-unit.source: Element
trans-unit.target: 元素

trans-unit.source: Example
trans-unit.target: 示例

trans-unit.source: \<Date>
trans-unit.target: \<日期 >

trans-unit.source: \<Time>
trans-unit.target: \<Time>

trans-unit.source: \<Offset>
trans-unit.target: \<Offset>

trans-unit.source: Although each of these elements is optional, \<Offset> cannot appear by itself.
trans-unit.target: 尽管每个元素是可选的但\<偏移量 > 不能单独出现。

trans-unit.source: It must be provided together with either \<Date> or \<Time>.
trans-unit.target: 它必须提供一起\<日期 > 或\<时间 >。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is missing, its default value is the current day.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 缺少，其默认值为当前日期。

trans-unit.source: If \<Date> is present but its year component consists of only two digits, it is converted to a year in the `provider` parameter's current calendar based on the value of the <xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<日期 > 是存在但其组件包含仅两个数字的年份，它将转换为一年`provider`参数的当前日历的值基于<xref:System.Globalization.Calendar.TwoDigitYearMax%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性。

trans-unit.source: If \<Time> is missing, its default value is 12:00:00 AM.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<时间 > 缺少，其默认值为 12:00:00 AM。

trans-unit.source: If \<Offset> is missing, its default value is the offset of the local time zone, or <xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType> if either the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> or <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is specified in the `styles` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果\<偏移量 > 缺少，其默认值为本地时区的偏移量或<xref:System.TimeSpan.Zero?displayProperty=nameWithType>如果<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>或<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>中指定值`styles`参数。

trans-unit.source: If \<Offset> is present, it can represent either a negative or a positive offset from Coordinated Universal Time (UTC).
trans-unit.target: 如果\<偏移量 > 存在，它可以表示负或正偏移量从协调世界时 (UTC)。

trans-unit.source: In either case, \<Offset> must include a sign symbol.
trans-unit.target: 在任一情况下，\<偏移量 > 必须包括正负符号。

trans-unit.source: The format of these three elements is defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, which can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: 这三个元素的格式由定义`formatProvider`可以为以下对象之一的参数：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture whose formatting is used in the `input` parameter.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示的格式设置中使用的区域性的对象`input`参数。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the formatting used in `input`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性定义中使用的格式`input`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。

trans-unit.source: Each element can also be enclosed by leading or trailing white space, and the \<Date> and \<Time> elements can include inner white space (such as 6: 00:00).
trans-unit.target: 每个元素也可由前导或尾随空格，括和\<日期 > 和\<时间 > 元素可以包含内部空格 （如 6: 00:00)。

trans-unit.source: Only the \<Offset> component cannot include inner white space.
trans-unit.target: 仅\<偏移量 > 组件不能包含内部空格。

trans-unit.source: If `formatprovider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用对应于当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The positive or negative sign used in \<Offset> must be either + or -.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的正整数或负号\<偏移量 > 必须为 + 或-。

trans-unit.source: It is not defined by the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A> or <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A> properties of the <xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo> object returned by the `formatProvider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 它不由定义<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.PositiveSign%2A>或<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo.NegativeSign%2A>属性<xref:System.Globalization.NumberFormatInfo>返回对象`formatProvider`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the members of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType> enumeration that are supported.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示的成员<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles?displayProperty=nameWithType>支持的枚举。

trans-unit.source: DateTimeStyles member
trans-unit.target: DateTimeStyles 成员

trans-unit.source: Description
trans-unit.target: 描述

trans-unit.source: Parses the string represented by `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 分析所表示的字符串`input`并且，如果有必要，请将其转换为 UTC。

trans-unit.source: It is equivalent to parsing a string and then calling the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> method of the returned <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 它相当于解析字符串，然后调用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ToUniversalTime%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法的返回<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象。

trans-unit.source: Although valid, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有效，但将忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Inner white space is permitted in the \<Date> and \<Time> elements.
trans-unit.target: 中允许内部空白\<日期 > 和\<时间 > 元素。

trans-unit.source: Although valid, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有效，但将忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Leading white space is permitted in front of each component in the parsed string.
trans-unit.target: 前导空白允许分析的字符串中每个组件的前面。

trans-unit.source: Although valid, this value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有效，但将忽略此值。

trans-unit.source: Trailing white space is permitted in front of each component in the parsed string.
trans-unit.target: 分析的字符串中每个组件的前面允许存在尾随空格。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认行为。

trans-unit.source: It cannot be overridden by supplying a more restrictive <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration value, such as <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 不能重写通过提供限制性更强<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>枚举值，如<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.None?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that, if the `input` parameter lacks an \<Offset> element, the offset of the local time zone should be provided.
trans-unit.target: 表明，如果`input`参数缺少\<偏移量 > 元素的情况下应提供的本地时区偏移量。

trans-unit.source: This is the default behavior of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: 这是默认行为的<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A>方法。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that, if the `input` parameter lacks an \<Offset> element, the UTC offset (00:00) should be provided.
trans-unit.target: 表明，如果`input`参数缺少\<偏移量 > 元素的情况下应提供的 UTC 偏移量 (00:00)。

trans-unit.source: Although valid, this value is ignored and has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 虽然有效，但此值将被忽略，并且没有影响。

trans-unit.source: Because the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> structure does not include a `Kind` property, this value has no effect.
trans-unit.target: 因为<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>结构不包括`Kind`属性，此值不起作用。

trans-unit.source: Only the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType> value is not supported.
trans-unit.target: 仅<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault?displayProperty=nameWithType>不支持值。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.ArgumentException> is thrown if this value is included in the `styles` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.ArgumentException>如果此值包含在引发`styles`参数。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates the effect of passing the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>, <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>, and <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType> values to the `styles` parameter of the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29> method.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例演示传递的效果<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal?displayProperty=nameWithType>， <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>，和<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AdjustToUniversal?displayProperty=nameWithType>值复制到`styles`参数<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29>方法。

trans-unit.source: The offset is greater than 14 hours or less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量大于 14 小时或小于 -14 小时。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="styles" /> is not a valid <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 不是有效的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="styles" /> includes an unsupported <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> value.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 包括不受支持的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="styles" /> includes <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> values that cannot be used together.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="styles" /> 包括不能在一起使用的 <see cref="T:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 中不包含有效的日期和时间的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> contains the string representation of an offset value without a date or time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 包含不带日期或时间的偏移量值的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent.
trans-unit.target: 将日期和时间的指定字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match a specified format exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的格式必须与指定的格式完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的日期和时间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A format specifier that defines the expected format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 格式说明符，用于定义 <c>input</c> 的预期格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供有关 <c>input</c> 的区域性特定格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent using the specified format and culture-specific format information.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式和区域性特定格式信息，将日期和时间的指定字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match the specified format exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的格式必须与指定的格式完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in <paramref name="input" /> as specified by <paramref name="format" /> and <paramref name="formatProvider" />.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它等效于 <paramref name="input" /> 中包含的日期和时间，由 <paramref name="format" /> 和 <paramref name="formatProvider" /> 指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29> method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29>方法分析的字符串表示形式必须是定义的格式的日期`format`参数。

trans-unit.source: It also requires that the \<Date>, \<Time>, and \<Offset> elements of the string representation of a date and time appear in the order specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 它还要求\<日期 >，\<时间 >，和\<偏移量 > 元素的字符串表示形式的日期和时间显示在指定的顺序中`format`。

trans-unit.source: If the `input` string does not match this `format` parameter, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`input`字符串与这都不匹配`format`参数，该方法将引发<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法分析的字符串表示形式中任何一种识别的格式提供程序的格式的日期<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A> also allows the \<Date>, \<Time>, and \<Offset> elements of the string representation of a date and time to appear in any order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A> 此外允许\<日期 >，\<时间 >，和\<偏移量 > 元素的字符串表示形式要按任何顺序显示的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required format of the `input` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数是一个字符串，包含单个标准格式说明符或一个或多个定义的所需的格式的自定义格式说明符`input`参数。

trans-unit.source: For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关有效格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。

trans-unit.source: If the sign is missing, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果缺少符号，则该方法将引发<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00).
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象分配午夜的时间 (0: 00:00)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned the current date on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`要求`input`包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象分配本地系统上的当前日期。

trans-unit.source: If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned the time zone offset of the local system.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`不要求`input`包含偏移量，生成<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象分配的本地系统时区偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter, as is the precise format of `input` if `format` is a standard format specifier string.
trans-unit.target: 特定日期和时间符号和中使用的字符串`input`由定义`formatProvider`参数，则精确格式`input`如果`format`是一个标准格式说明符字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数可以为下列操作之一：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示的区域性的对象在其上基于`input`解释。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by its <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A> property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象由其<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A>属性定义的符号和中的格式设置`input`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `formatprovider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用对应于当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The following example uses the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method with standard and custom format specifiers and the invariant culture to parse several date and time strings.
trans-unit.target: 下面的示例使用<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>与要分析多个日期和时间字符串的标准和自定义格式说明符和固定区域性的方法。

trans-unit.source: The offset is greater than 14 hours or less than -14 hours.
trans-unit.target: 偏移量大于 14 小时或小于 -14 小时。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="format" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 为空字符串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="input" /> does not contain a valid string representation of a date and time.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 中不包含有效的日期和时间的字符串表示形式。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="format" /> is an empty string.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="format" /> 是一个空字符串。

trans-unit.source: -or-
trans-unit.target: 或

trans-unit.source: The hour component and the AM/PM designator in <paramref name="input" /> do not agree.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="input" /> 中的小时组成部分和 AM/PM 指示符不一致。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)], the <see cref="Overload:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact" /> method throws a <see cref="T:System.FormatException" /> if the string to be parsed contains an hour component and an AM/PM designator that are not in agreement.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v40_short](~/includes/net-v40-short-md.md)]、<see cref="Overload:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact" />方法抛出异常<see cref="T:System.FormatException" />如果要分析的字符串包含小时组成部分和 AM/PM 指示符，并不一致。

trans-unit.source: In the [!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)] and earlier versions, the AM/PM designator is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在[!INCLUDE[net_v35_short](~/includes/net-v35-short-md.md)]和早期版本中，AM/PM 指示符将被忽略。

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a date and time to convert.
trans-unit.target: 包含要转换的日期和时间的字符串。

trans-unit.source: A format specifier that defines the expected format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 格式说明符，用于定义 <c>input</c> 的预期格式。

trans-unit.source: An object that supplies culture-specific formatting information about <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，提供有关 <c>input</c> 的区域性特定格式设置信息。

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of enumeration values that indicates the permitted format of <c>input</c>.
trans-unit.target: 枚举值的按位组合，指示 <c>input</c> 允许使用的格式。

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified string representation of a date and time to its <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" /> equivalent using the specified format, culture-specific format information, and style.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的格式、区域性特定的格式信息和样式将日期和时间的指定字符串表示形式转换为其等效的 <see cref="T:System.DateTimeOffset" />。

trans-unit.source: The format of the string representation must match the specified format exactly.
trans-unit.target: 字符串表示形式的格式必须与指定的格式完全匹配。

trans-unit.source: An object that is equivalent to the date and time that is contained in the <paramref name="input" /> parameter, as specified by the <paramref name="format" />, <paramref name="formatProvider" />, and <paramref name="styles" /> parameters.
trans-unit.target: 一个对象，它等效于 <paramref name="input" /> 参数中包含的日期和时间，由 <paramref name="format" />、<paramref name="formatProvider" /> 和 <paramref name="styles" /> 参数指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date, which must be in the format defined by the `format` parameter.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.ParseExact%28System.String%2CSystem.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法分析的字符串表示形式必须是定义的格式的日期`format`参数。

trans-unit.source: It also requires that the \<Date>, \<Time>, and \<Offset> elements of the string representation of a date and time appear in the order specified by `format`.
trans-unit.target: 它还要求\<日期 >，\<时间 >，和\<偏移量 > 元素的字符串表示形式的日期和时间显示在指定的顺序中`format`。

trans-unit.source: If the `input` string does not match the pattern of the `format` parameter, with any variations defined by the `styles` parameter, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果`input`字符串不匹配的模式`format`参数，并具有定义的任何变体`styles`参数，该方法将引发<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: In contrast, the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType> method parses the string representation of a date in any one of the formats recognized by the format provider's <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object.
trans-unit.target: 与此相反，<xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%28System.String%2CSystem.IFormatProvider%2CSystem.Globalization.DateTimeStyles%29?displayProperty=nameWithType>方法分析的字符串表示形式中任何一种识别的格式提供程序的格式的日期<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>对象。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A> also allows the \<Date>, \<Time>, and \<Offset> elements of the string representation of a date and time to appear in any order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.DateTimeOffset.Parse%2A> 此外允许\<日期 >，\<时间 >，和\<偏移量 > 元素的字符串表示形式要按任何顺序显示的日期和时间。

trans-unit.source: The `format` parameter is a string that contains either a single standard format specifier or one or more custom format specifiers that define the required pattern of the `input` parameter.
trans-unit.target: `format`参数是一个字符串，包含单个标准格式说明符或一个或多个定义的所需的模式的自定义格式说明符`input`参数。

trans-unit.source: For details about valid formatting codes, see [Standard Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md) and [Custom Date and Time Format Strings](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md).
trans-unit.target: 有关有效格式设置代码的详细信息，请参阅[标准日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/standard-date-and-time-format-strings.md)和[自定义日期和时间格式字符串](~/docs/standard/base-types/custom-date-and-time-format-strings.md)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` includes the `z`, `zz`, or `zzz` custom format specifiers to indicate that an offset must be present in `input`, that offset must include either a negative sign or a positive sign.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`包括`z`， `zz`，或`zzz`自定义格式说明符，以指示某一偏移量必须存在于`input`，该偏移量必须包括正号或负号。

trans-unit.source: If the sign is missing, the method throws a <xref:System.FormatException>.
trans-unit.target: 如果缺少符号，则该方法将引发<xref:System.FormatException>。

trans-unit.source: If `format` requires that `input` contain a date but not a time, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned a time of midnight (0:00:00).
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`要求`input`包含日期而不是时间，则会为生成<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象分配午夜的时间 (0: 00:00)。

trans-unit.source: If `format` requires that `input` contain a time but not a date, the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object is assigned the current date on the local system.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`要求`input`包含时间而不是日期，则会为生成<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象分配本地系统上的当前日期。

trans-unit.source: If `format` does not require that `input` contain an offset, the offset of the resulting <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object depends on the value of the `styles` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 如果`format`不要求`input`包含偏移量，所产生的偏移量<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象依赖于的值`styles`参数。

trans-unit.source: If `styles` includes <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal>, the offset of the local time zone is assigned to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`styles`包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeLocal>，本地时区的偏移量分配给<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象。

trans-unit.source: If `styles` includes <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal>, the Coordinated Universal Time (UTC) offset, or +00:00, is assigned to the <xref:System.DateTimeOffset> object.
trans-unit.target: 如果`styles`包括<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.AssumeUniversal>，协调世界时 (UTC) 偏移量，或 + 00:00，分配给<xref:System.DateTimeOffset>对象。

trans-unit.source: If neither value is specified, the offset of the local time zone is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果未指定任何值，则使用本地时区的偏移量。

trans-unit.source: The particular date and time symbols and strings used in `input` are defined by the `formatProvider` parameter.
trans-unit.target: 特定日期和时间符号和中使用的字符串`input`由定义`formatProvider`参数。

trans-unit.source: The same is true for the precise format of `input`, if `format` is a standard format specifier string.
trans-unit.target: 同样适用于的确切格式`input`，如果`format`是一个标准格式说明符字符串。

trans-unit.source: The `formatProvider` parameter can be either of the following:
trans-unit.target: `formatProvider`参数可以为下列操作之一：

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that represents the culture based on which `input` is interpreted.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>表示的区域性的对象在其上基于`input`解释。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object returned by the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType> property defines the symbols and formatting in `input`.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>返回对象<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo.DateTimeFormat%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>属性定义的符号和中的格式设置`input`。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo> object that defines the format of date and time data.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeFormatInfo>定义的日期和时间数据格式的对象。

trans-unit.source: If `formatprovider` is `null`, the <xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo> object that corresponds to the current culture is used.
trans-unit.target: 如果`formatprovider`是`null`、<xref:System.Globalization.CultureInfo>使用对应于当前区域性的对象。

trans-unit.source: The `styles` parameter defines whether white space is allowed in the input string, indicates how strings without an explicit offset component are parsed, and supports UTC conversion as part of the parsing operation.
trans-unit.target: `styles`参数定义是否允许空白区域输入字符串，指示无显式的偏移量组成部分的字符串分析的方式，并且支持在分析操作的一部分进行 UTC 转换。

trans-unit.source: All members of the <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles> enumeration are supported except <xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault>.
trans-unit.target: 所有成员<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles>枚举支持除外<xref:System.Globalization.DateTimeStyles.NoCurrentDateDefault>。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the effect of each supported member.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出的每个受支持的成员的效果。

trans-unit.source: `DateTimeStyles` member
trans-unit.target: `DateTimeStyles` 成员

trans-unit.source: Behavior
trans-unit.target: 行为

trans-unit.source: Parses `input` and, if necessary, converts it to UTC.
trans-unit.target: 分析`input`并且，如果有必要，请将其转换为 UTC。
